entry.title: Making platformer(Part 1)
entry.content:
So i’m making platformer game. And here i am going to talk about my progress of making platform game.

So this game looks like this test game but more fun stuff, dialogs, music, and more stuff.

Today i’m testing background and background music. Everything work fine.

Tomorrow i will working with dialogs.

About characters:

I will not hand draw the characters. I’m too lazy(Really). I just do all the characters and evil dudes square.
